p: Samples were evaluated using AOAC (The Association of Official Analytical Chemists) procedures with minor modifications [ 21]. The total carbohydrate content was measured by subtracting the contents of moisture, ash, fat, and protein from 100 and reported as a percentage of dry mass. The dietary fiber content was determined by enzymatic and gravimetric methods. The crude protein content was evaluated by the Macro-Kjeldahl method.
